name: The Unknown Gray Portraits (Refreshing Random)
description: In the digital work "The Unknown Gray Portraits" (from The Unknown Portraits Series), new fantasy portraits of unknown gray people are generated with every HTML refresh - from elements that were previously digitally painted. The combination is made up of 10 element types, each with up to 10 + 1 red variants. The works of The Unknown Portraits Series are digital drawings or paintings in which the artist addresses the "portraits" in the digital age - it's about avatars and profile pictures, face recognition and the handling of personal rights in today's world. It's about simplification. And it's about uniqueness.
